caption.title: CHIK viral loads in adult vs aged mice.
caption.p: Infectious viral loads were determined from sera collected on days 2, 4, and 6 post-infection. A] Viral loads in mice vaccinated with VLP in comparison to control groups and B] Viral loads in mice vaccinated with VLP plus QuilA in comparison to control groups. The mean Â± S.E.M are reported. One-way, two-tailed ANOVA, followed by Tukey post-hoc tests were performed: ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001, and **** p < 0.0001.
